about.name: dk-bib
about.caption: Danish variants of standard BibTeX styles.

description.abstract: Dk-bib is a translation of the four standard BibTeX style files (abbrv, alpha, plain and unsrt) into Danish. The files have been extended with ISBN and ISSN fields. Actually these files were translated from the Norwegian translation (by Dag Langmyhr) into Danish. Dag also made the extension for ISBN and ISSN.
